Reference

cscplots

Functions for identifying and analysing cancer stem cells from scRNA-Seq

cscplots - t-SNE Functions

Functions for running t-SNEs on cancer scRNA-Seq

run_all_tSNEs()

Run t-SNEs for cancer single-cells expression matrix for all perplexity values provided.

run_tSNE()

Run a t-SNE for cancer single-cells expression matrix for a perplexity value provided.

cscplots - Predictor Functions

Functions for running cell type predictors on cancer scRNA-Seq

run_ML_stemness_predictors()

Run machine learning stemness predictors.

run_ML_cellType_predictors()

Run machine learning stemness predictors.

cscplots - Plot Functions

Functions for printing t-SNEs & PCAs of cancer scRNA-Seq

plot_scores()

Plot a score overlaid on a supplied t-SNE or PCA generated using a cancer single-cell population expression matrix.

plot_scores_with_grid()

Plot a score overlaid on a supplied t-SNE or PCA generated using a cancer single-cell population expression matrix, with grid in background.

plot_categories()

Plot a cell category overlaid on a supplied t-SNE or PCA generated using a cancer single-cell population expression matrix.

plot_categories_with_grid()

Plot a cell category overlaid on a supplied t-SNE or PCA generated using a cancer single-cell population expression matrix, with grid in background.

print_tSNE_coloured_by_gene()

Print a list of t-SNEs each overlaid with expression of a specic genes; multiple t-SNE prints can generated using a list of genes.

plot_field_with_thresholds()

Plot a score overlaid on a supplied t-SNE or PCA generated using a cancer single-cell population expression matrix; a range in the score defined by 2 thresholds is coloured grey and light grey below the lower threshold.

cscplots - Expression Matrix Conversions

Functions for converting the values in an expression matrix containing cancer scRNA-Seq

count_fractions_transcriptwise()

Convert a matrix of expression values to a matrix of count fraction values.

count_fractions_per_base_transcriptwise()

Convert a matrix of read counts to a matrix of Cells Per Million values.

tpm_samplewise()

Convert a matrix of read counts to a matrix of Transcripts Per Million values.

cscplots - Preferential Expression Functions

Functions for printing preferential expression in cell subsets in cancer scRNA-Seq

print_preferential_expression_bar_graphs()

Print preferential expression bar graphs for subset of single-cells.

printTripletSingleTranscriptBarcharts()

Print expression bar graph for genes/transcripts most highly expressed in selected putative CSCs vs tumour cells vs all cells.

printBarchartSingleTranscriptNoStacking()

Print expression bar graph for genes/transcripts most highly expressed in selected putative CSCs.

stackedBarchartsForSingleTranscripts()

Print expression stacked bar graph for genes/transcripts most preferentially expressed in selected putative CSCs.

stackedFamilyExpressionBarchartSingleBars()

Print expression stacked bar graph for HUGO gene groups most preferentially expressed in selected putative CSCs.

cscplots - Misc. Functions

Additional miscellaneous function/s

add_scores_to_tSNE_results()

Add scores to list of t-SNE results.

add_zeros_to_perplexity_values()

Function to add zeros to the start of perplexity values to make them nicer for printing.

get_expression_scores_correlations()

Get correlations between a single-cell expression matrix and a vector of scores for each cell.

getGenesFullNames()

Convert a vector of gene names into their corresponding full HUGO gene names.

getGenesAndFullNamesDF()

Convert a vector of gene names into a data frame containing gene names and matching full HUGO gene names.

get_gene_lengths_using_gene_names()

Get gene lengths using HUGO gene names.

get_transcript_lengths_using_gene_names()

Get transcript lengths using HUGO gene names.

get_HUGO_names_from_gene_IDs()

Get HUGO gene names for a list of Ensembl gene IDs.

map_gene_positions_to_HUGO_gene_groups()

For all HUGO gene groups find all their members positions in a list of genes.

round_up()

Function to round up numbers to nearest numbers divisible by a specified value.

round_down()

Function to round down numbers to nearest numbers divisible by a specified value.

select_tSNE_box_positions()

Select cells from a t-SNE that are located within a defined rectangle.
